document_data.name: ''Spear of the Wandering Legion''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Spear of the Wandering Legion''''' was a magical weapon that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: This spear had an intricately etched shaft of slim [[silver]].
document_data.Powers: When struck on the ground three times by a servant of the [[Grand Caliph]] this spear would summon several hundred [[faris]] to serve the wielder. The summoned farisan did not appear magically, rather they had to arrive by conventional means. These individuals were the descendants of the [[Wandering Legion]] and would only serve the wielder if they upheld the [[Law of the Loregiver]].
